text_importexport_content: Lapha ungangenisa futhi uthumele izikhumbuzo zakho.
text_notifications1: Izaziso kumele zinikwe amandla ukusebenzisa lolu hlelo lokusebenza:
text_help_content1: Isikhumbuzi esivulekile uhlelo lokusebenza oluthumela izaziso ngezikhathi ezichaziwe zesikhathi.
text_help_content2: Ukuze ungeze isikhumbuzi esisha, cindezela isithonjana se- "plus". Ngemuva kwalokho, hlela izinkambu zombhalo bese ufaka isihloko sesaziso, isikhawu (ngemizuzwana), umbhalo ozoqukethwe emzimbeni wesaziso, kanye ne-URL yesithonjana.
text_help_content3: Lapho uhlelo lokusebenza lusebenza esipheqululini, lapho-ke isiphequluli singakhubaza izaziso uma uhlelo lokusebenza lungavulekile kuthebhu esebenzayo. Uma ngabe uhlelo lufakiwe, ucingo lwakho lungamisa uhlelo, ikakhulukazi uma ibhethri ledivayisi yakho liphansi. Ngakho-ke, sebenzisa lolu hlelo lokusebenza uma lungaba usizo kuwe, kepha ungalusebenzisi nganoma yini ebalulekile.
text_help_content4: Kumenyu yezilungiselelo ungashintsha ulimi lwesixhumi esibonakalayo somsebenzisi.
text_help_content5: Ukungenisa noma ukuthekelisa izikhumbuzo, cindezela isithonjana sokungenisa / ukuthekelisa. Lapho ungenisa izikhumbuzi kufayela, izikhumbuzi zamanje zizosuswa bese zibhalwa ngaphezulu.
text_help_content6: Isikhumbuzi esivulekile uhlelo lokusebenza lweWebhu oluqhubekayo, okusho ukuthi lungena ngaphakathi kwesiphequluli. Uma uyifaka, ngenkathi izingxenye zesiphequluli zingakhonjiswa, isebenza ngaphakathi kwesiphequluli. Izikhumbuzi zigcinwa kusitoreji sendawo sesiphequluli sesizinda sesikhumbuzi.marcoparrone.com. i-localStorage isebenza kahle ngeziphequluli ze-Chrome, Edge neFirefox. Ezinye iziphequluli zingasusa isitoreji sendawo ngemuva kwesikhathi esithile. I-Android ngokuzenzakalela isebenzisa i-Chrome, iWindows ngokwakhona isebenzisa i-Edge. Isikhumbuzi esivulekile okwamanje asisekelwa kumikhiqizo ye-Apple. Ngenhloso yokusiza ukuvimbela ukulahleka kwezikhumbuzi, kuphakanyiswa ukwenza ibhekhaphu usebenzisa ukusebenza "kokuthekelisa", njalo lapho wenza izinguquko ezithile ongafuni ukulahlekelwa zizo.
text_about_content3: I-SOFTWARE INIKEZELWA "NJENGOBA INJALO", NGAPHANDLE KWESIQINISEKISO SONKE UHLOBO, BONISA NOMA UFAKELWE, KUHLANGANISWA KODWA AKUNAMKHAWULO EZIQINISEKISWA KWEZOKUTHENGISANA, UKULUNGELELWA KWENHLOSO ETHILE KANYE NOKUNGABONI. NGEKE KWENZEKE ABABHALI NOMA ABAPHATHI BELUNGELO LOKUQOPHA BABE NESIBOPHO SONKE ISIMANGALO, UKULIMALA NOMA OKUNYE ISIBOPHO, NGOKUTHI KUSENZENZANI SENKONZO, I-TORT NOMA NGOKUNYE, OKUVELA KU, OUT OF OR UKUXHUMANA NE-SOFTWARE NOMA UKUSETSHENZISWA KANYE NEZINYE IZIPHUMELA ISOFUTHI.
text_about_content4: LENKONZO KUNGAQUKETHA IZINGUQULO EZINIKEZWA NGU-GOOGLE. I-GOOGLE IKHALA IZIMPAWU ZONKE EZIPHATHELENE NEZINULELO, UKUBEKA OKUQUKETHWE NOMA OKUFAKIWE, KUFAKA IZIMPAWU ZOKUQINISEKISA, UKUTHEMBEKA, NANOMA YILUPHI IZIQINISEKISO ZOKWENZA UMSEBENZI, UKULUNGELELWA KWENJONGO ETHILE NOKUNGABONI.
text_about_content5: Lolu hlelo lokusebenza lwewebhu luhunyushelwe ukuzilungiselela usebenzisa isoftware yokuhumusha enikwa amandla yi-Google Translate. Kwenziwe imizamo enengqondo yokunikeza ukuhumusha okunembile, noma kunjalo, akukho ukuhumusha okuzenzakalelayo okungaphelele futhi akuhloselwe ukufaka esikhundleni sabahumushi abangabantu. Ukuhumusha kunikezwa njengesevisi kubasebenzisi bewebhusayithi ye-marcoparrone.com, futhi kunikezwa "njengoba kunjalo." Ayikho iwaranti yanoma iluphi uhlobo, noma eveziwe noma esetshenzisiwe, enziwa ngokunemba, ukwethembeka, noma ukunemba kwanoma yiziphi izinguqulo ezenziwe ngesiNgisi ziye kolunye ulimi. Okunye okuqukethwe (njengezithombe, amavidiyo, i-Flash, njll.) Kungahle kungahunyushelwa ngokunembile ngenxa yemikhawulo yesoftware yokuhumusha.
text_about_content6: Umbhalo osemthethweni yinguqulo yesiNgisi yewebhusayithi. Noma ikuphi ukungafani noma umehluko owenziwe ekuhumusheni akubophi futhi akunamphumela osemthethweni wokuhambisana noma wokusebenzisa ngenhloso. Uma kuba khona imibuzo ehlobene nokunemba kolwazi oluqukethwe kuwebhusayithi ehunyushiwe, bheka inguqulo yesiNgisi yewebhusayithi okuyiyona nguqulo esemthethweni.
